website_summaries.verdict: Floating is more fun on a giant flamingo – especially when the bird holds air well and can carry a lot of people.
pros: Makes a statement without saying a word
Comes with a pump and a carry bag
Easy to inflate with included pump
Same company makes one in a giant unicorn style
cons: The pump does not work on batteries
You will need to find an outlet to inflate your flamingo island
Shape makes it hard to navigate

customer_reviews.title: if you are looking for a fun float that holds a lot of people this is ...
customer_reviews.text: if you are looking for a fun float that holds a lot of people this is it! our whole campsite wanted to buy her "we named her pinky" make sure you have somewhere to store her. and the anchor worked great
customer_reviews.author: mary Toombs

customer_reviews.title: Ms Flamingo was a hit! We could have taken orders all day as people inquired!
customer_reviews.text: Ms. Flamingo is now a member of our family. We just launched her this past weekend and had a blast. Because the beach is quite crowded in many areas of South Haven, Michigan, we inflated her with a gas generator by the beach area. Once inflated, 5 girls walked Ms. Flamingo above our heads through the beach crowds and landed her in the water. We floated her to a more remote area and floated all day! We were so proud of ourselves to be able to handle a bird this size! It was so much fun and will make great memories for years to come! We expect to see a flock of flamingos join us!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Slattery

customer_reviews.title: I need air
customer_reviews.text: The first 12 hrs were amazing....We planned on tying it to our boat dock eventually... Until this happened... Deflated within 18 hours :( Filled this again and within two hours it was deflated. I would not recommend this. Only if you have a party and you plan on throwing it out but $230 is pretty expensive for something to last such a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unique waterfront fun island.
customer_reviews.text: It was a hit with our lake front Fourth of July gathering of our kids, their spouses and grandkids and friends. Multiple boats had to come in for a closer look. It tied up nicely to the dock. Was comfortable to sit in and share a beer. Our feet were always in a couple inches of water because of mesh bottom and this helped prevent overheating. Getting in and out was always good for a few laughs. It set up easily and stored easily. Hopefully we can get several years use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: WE HAD A BLAST!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I brought this out on the lake for a party we throw every year and it was a BIG HIT! We had at least 50 - 60 people on it throughout the course of the whole day and it held up well. The kids loved it and we were able to utilize the built in cooler on it for beverages. We took the box with us right to the lake and blew it up and then attached the rope to the boat so it was always with us!
customer_reviews.author: Salesvp

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Sun Pleasure Giant Flamingo and have loved it! (Actually, I now own 3 of them -- all my friends and family love it!) Unfortunately, the last flamingo I purchased arrived with defects in the seam of the body-compartment. I emailed Sun Pleasure's Customer Service (customerservice@sunpleasure.com) and received a prompt reply. Within a few days, I had a complete replacement flamingo shipped to me - at no charge. Incredible customer service and warranty, especially for an inflatable. I highly recommend purchasing! You'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bknapp

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: There was a rip in the float and was patched when we received also a hole was in the seat which we patched paying 300.00 was too much. It is a big bother to return it so we kept it
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4th of July party and it lasted all of 20 min. Used it in calm waters. It appeared to get snagged on something that riped 2 holes in it. The patches it came with were useless. I have since bought new patches and hope to have it up and running again soon, but it is not as durable as it appears. If the patches I bought do not hold, I will enquire about the warranty. It was really fun for that 20 min though, hence the 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Click the purchase button!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase of 2019. Lots of people eying this beauty of a bird from land!! Took a couple times blowing it up to really get fluent with the best way to blow it up. Definitely blow it up like they suggest. It takes about 20 mins to blow up and deflates in about the same amount of time. The cooler with ice on board keep drinks really cold. We sat 8 adults comfortably. Our two toddlers love to splash in the mesh center. My pump died the first time we used it, I contacted them via email and they got back to immediately and next day shipped me a new pump. Customer service was exceptional!
customer_reviews.author: Feeney

customer_reviews.title: It was fun, but very very hard to manage and its ...
customer_reviews.text: It holds closer to 10-12 people than 6! It is WAY to big for 6 people. It was fun, but very very hard to manage and its so big if there is any wind its hard to manage. We could not even anchor it to keep it steady. Takes at least 6 people to get into water. Also, quite challenging to get in and out of water.
customer_reviews.author: Lane W.

customer_reviews.title: Popped in an hour don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Popped within an hour don’t waste your money. We were so excited to take this to the lake. Put it in the water and before anyone even sat on it it started deflating. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check before, good material, has Leaks!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to bring to Cayman Islands for the month. Did not open sealed box until I arrived. Was a return bar code already in box from Aug. paid 100.00 in baggage fee due to weight. Has 2 giant holes in bench and neck. No patch kit and totally un usable to me as am not paying to checkmit home. Waste of money. Return clearly never checked in Aug. trying for refund or will still be out baggage fee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only 3 outings.
customer_reviews.text: If you are on a dock or beach with a electrical pump then it might be easy. But otherwise takes 30mins. Looks really cool but only last 3 fully sessions before ware and tear started. Holes started to develop and their”patch kit “ was useless. Kinda annoyed it lasted that little of time. Plus deflating it and folding it up is a mental struggle. Had fun on it but needs way better price to go with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: William Murphy

customer_reviews.title: USELESS ITEM
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased for a special event. On arriving at the remote location the pump supplied was not functional. Hence the float was useless and ruined the day for all concerned. I am now left with a float I no longer need that has never even been inflated. Due to purchasing ahead of the event I am now unable to return the item either. A complete waste of a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Gill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Float!
customer_reviews.text: My niece and nephews loved this float! The flamingo is very large and hard to miss as it floats on the bay. The netting on the bottom allows a little water for your feet while in the float but does not allow any seaweed or anything to also cone up. I would have given 5 stars but the pump included to blow up the float was too small for such a big float and started smoking before we finished blowing up the float for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for his 13th birthday since it’s all he wanted and it’s kind of expensive..he loves it and all the kids have a blast with it in the pool..2 problems- the cup holders are worthless they don’t hold anything there not deep enough, which the kids didn’t care about anyway, and one of the inside seats popped after a week of use, but didn’t wanna return it since it seems like a hassle.. but I would still by it again and recommended it to anyone that has kids.. it’s hours of fun for them:)))
customer_reviews.author: Waters Edge!

customer_reviews.title: Fun float
customer_reviews.text: This float definitely gets noticed and is a lot of fun at the lake. It is large and takes some time to inflate but the pump that comes with it makes the job pretty easy. Seems sturdy and well put together, stayed inflated for a week with no problems before we deflated it. Hopefully it holds up well over time.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent but poorly made
customer_reviews.text: We saw perforations in the seen right out of the package. It’s magnificent when blown up but due to its lack of durability it started to deflate very quickly and we weren’t really able to enjoy it the way we expected. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FLOAT!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun....had two couples floating on it, while the kids played around us, climbing in and out. The kids even pushed us around the cove and took us on a "tour". Even when a few kids joined us, there was plenty of room. Big enough to not only sit, but to lay down and catch some rays. Loved that water collects in the bottom, and kept our feet cool....It we felt like we were in the water, without being actually IN the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WIN beach day and buy this
customer_reviews.text: BEST huge float for the $. I got this around $130 which is much cheaper than the flamingo or swam one. (It is the same size as those just no animal design). It takes about a half hour to blow up with a good pump and if you fill the anchor with a bag of rocks you can chillin the water all day. Make sure to get a stronger rope for the anchor.
customer_reviews.author: Greg D

customer_reviews.title: Incredible family float, I must have for a lake vacation
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a summer vacation it was amazing we had 12 people 7 adults five children and it was absolutely amazing shipped promptly inflated quickly also deflated quickly with the pump the only flaw is the pump didn't fit the small rings but there was so tiny it didn't really matter would buy this again and again and again
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Investment of fun
customer_reviews.text: Took us 30 minutes to inflate and it held air the entire time even in the Arizona heat. Once on the water, it held well amongst rocks and a pretty strong tide. We had 4 adults inside and everyone loved it. Deflating it was a bit harder and took about 20 minutes or so. Very heavy to carry but an overall great investment for our trips to the river 😁
customer_reviews.author: Big Muscle Gains

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to inflate/deflate. Once it in the water, it was a little awkward getting into it, but once you're on it, you won't want to leave it! Cupholders are an awesome idea but they're not really functional. Didn't bother us, though. The anchor bag made it very easy, and the carrying bag is very helpful. We are so pleased with this purchase. Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.author: Cissy Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Summer fun at its finest
customer_reviews.text: After tons of research, I purchased the Flamingo Float last Labor Day. It was no doubt the highlight of the weekend. It comfortably fit 4 kids and 4 adults. It is easy to inflate and easy to pack up and put away. This summer when I took it out, it had a hole in the seam on of the neck. I contacted Sun Pleasure and after a few questions they replaced my Flamingo. And not only that it was done quickly and just in time for our vacay! Love a company that stands by its products and its warranty! Do not buy from any other supplier. Sun Pleasure values its customers!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is so huge and so awesome!!! Easy to inflate. The pump works fantastic. Hours and hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: ASoccermom

customer_reviews.title: LIFE OF THE PARTAAAAY
customer_reviews.text: I'll be brief- if you have a lake or other large, mostly flat body of water to take this out on, BUY IT! It's absolutely amazing and literally MAKES the party an amazing one. Took this out on Lake Tahoe with 12 adults on it, comfortably + drinks in the cooler. Absolutely a stunner, the USS Pinkie is.
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Yay!!!😀😀😀, fantastic investment?!! Still very happy with this purchase😀
customer_reviews.text: Fun fun fun times 😁😁😁 still... However, we've discovered that the side handles are structurally weak and cause leaks. We've experienced one such, but still having a blast, even named her Pink Floydia🙃🙄🙃😂! We've also invested in a beach trolley cause the float is quite heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha Andrewin

customer_reviews.title: Flamingo!
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing! We had so many kids playing in it for hours. So much fun and no issues at all. Most amazing purchase ever. Comes with a pump that inflates and deflates. However it is only a plug for a regular outlet not a car pump. We still were able to use it after I bought a converter. All in all great buy
customer_reviews.author: Jaimee Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: I love this bird!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing you can get for a fabulous summer! Got a few good friends? Take them ALL with you when you hit the water for some serious floatin’! I purchased “Pricilla the Pink Plamingo” for Drift Jam 2018. One of the largest floating concerts in the country. It’s held in South Carolina on Lake Murray, a place I’m proud to call home. We found she holds more than 6 people...she’s a tuff old bird... and she’s never met a stranger! People swimming by would just hop in! Best day ever!
customer_reviews.author: NAME_NOT_RETURNED

customer_reviews.title: It pops
customer_reviews.text: It popped while blowing it up the first time, I never got a chance to actually use it... rather of wasted 250$ wiping my ass
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Club Flamingo!!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product and it's very sturdy. It was a great hit with my family and we enjoyed it. We dubbed it Club Flamingo.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: THIS HAS A HOLE RIGHT ON THE SEEM VERY UPSET AND DISAPPOINTED THIS WAS EXPENSIVE I WILL SEND BACK
customer_reviews.text: DUE TO THE COVID 19 WE WERE NOT ABLE TO USE OUR FLOAT UNTIL LAST WEEK. THE FLOAT BLEW UP AND THE KIDS WENT ON, WITH IN AN HOUR IT DEFLATED. WE LOOKED THERE IS A LEAK RIGHT ON THE SEAM. i AM VERY DISAPPOINTED I PAID A LOT OF MONEY AND FEEL THIS IS NOT FAIR. i GAVE THE OTHER AS A GIFT AND THEY HAVE NOT BEEN ABE TO USE IT YET. i HOPE IT DOESN'T HAVE A HOLE. I am so disappointed that i have not heard from Amazon. I am not sure i will be renewing my prime account and I order alot. VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Martignett

customer_reviews.title: Need some quirks fixed
customer_reviews.text: If it worked it would have been alot of fun. The cup holders are useless. They are in the wrong place when you sit it tilts and they are not deep enough to hold any type of cup. The handle s broke on the first use. The idea was nice but has quirks to be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Chacon

customer_reviews.title: So easy to inflate.
customer_reviews.text: SO easy to inflate! Took about 20 minutes! You might want an extension cord because the cord on the pump is short. Not a big deal. This thing is enormous! We have it tethered to a lake dock.
customer_reviews.author: Clarice

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, that everyone loved!
customer_reviews.text: The Flamingo Island is awesome. The only thing you’ll need is a longer rope for the anchor. We had 6 adults and two kids on it with ease. It is made with high quality material and is easy to inflate and deflate with the pump provided. It was just as easy to fold up and place into the carrying bag provided as well.
customer_reviews.author: cbadger

customer_reviews.title: Bird takes a beating
customer_reviews.text: First season of use included three major wind storms on our Montana Lake. She was thrashed and the 40# anchor was lifted out of the lake by waves and the bird “face-planted” on shore! We now have one slow leak in the neck. We consider that AMAZING! Great product! Kids love it for play & adults for sunbathing with water relief in center!
customer_reviews.author: Careful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This thing is huge!! Big hit with the kids!
customer_reviews.text: We took this giant bird to the lake and it was a big hit with the kids. Great quality and durable however we did have a seat that seemed to have a leak. I messaged the seller asking for a repair kit and they shipped us an entire new flamingo without hesitation! Great customer service! I would highly recommended this purchase! Hoping to have an entire summer or two of fun with it tied off to our dock!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Rich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy and durable, especially noticeable when hosting my daughters 13th birthday with 7 other teenagers on float!
customer_reviews.author: House of Payne

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!!! So much fun!! It is some work to blow it up and it’s definitely not something you can tow behind the boat to move across the lake ( and it does NOT fit on the back of the wakeboard boat very well) but I love how big it is because it fits all your friends!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: So. Much. Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is one tough bird. Everyone from 3 to 80 on our family trip had a blast on this guy. The only downside is I couldn’t bring him back home on the plane with me because he’s so heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my family for Labor Day and it was a huge hit! The flamingo is easy to inflate and the quality is awesome. We had it in the lake for about 8 hours each day and it barely deflated and we had 6+ people on it at one time. The pump that comes with it is easy to use as well. It is definitely worth the money! The only thing that was disappointing was the depth of the cup holders, other than that it is a great product that we plan to use again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Franz

customer_reviews.title: Big & Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This was SOOO fun!! 4 adults and 3 small kids floating down the river blowing bubbles! Just know - The air compressor is great if you have a real electrical outlet. You need a car-compatible air compressor if you are inflating at a remote location. The car compressor we borrowed was a lot slower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS PACKAGE IS EXTREMELY HEAVY TO CARRY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item and took it to Fire Island Pines (direct delivery wasn't possible). You must understand that this item is EXTREMELY heavy. Is has been a pain to carry by foot; on the train; on the ferry and back.
customer_reviews.author: MBRISE

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS FLOAT! We tether it to our dock. It’s a great size!
customer_reviews.author: MK78

customer_reviews.title: Fun!! But, not durable enough for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this last summer & used it for 2 months. We went to use it this summer & there are multiple holes. We tried to patch, but it wasn’t salvageable. Too pricey for something you can use for such a limited time! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: hali williams

customer_reviews.title: Flamingo at the Sandbar
customer_reviews.text: Had so much fun with this bird for my birthday at the sandbar. Was easy to inflate and took about 30-40 minutes. Would recommend 2 to 3 battery powered air mattress pumps and a good team to set-up. Anchor bag it came with Iwas good, but might want to get another anchor just in case or a small paddle. Only other thing I would want to change are the cup holders and wished they were deeper to actually hold our cups. Other than that the flamingo was a hit and it was so majestic against the sandbar scenery and calm, crystal clear water. Loved this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Car

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Bird
customer_reviews.text: This party bird is awesome. We have taken it out to the lake twice now and it’s be great. Very easy to inflate/deflate and not hard to get back in bag at all. I am very pleased with this purchase. Buy the party bird! You will not be disappointed. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Shawn West

customer_reviews.title: Giant Bird! Giant Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Blows up really fast with the great pump supplied. Comes with nice mesh storage bag and bag to fill with sand or rocks to make anchor. Also comes with some nice nylon rope. Everyone who has tried it said it was the best fun! Buy one. You won't regret it. Named her Lola. She is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Bjorkland

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I took this floatie to Mexico, used it for 5 days straight in the lagoon, kids where jumping all over it and it was perfect 👌🏼
customer_reviews.author: otilia b.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasure completely stands behind their products I was very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: We have a family cabin UpNorth in WI. So This gets a lot if use ALL summer. It is beautiful floating in the water~ better looking than anyone we have ever owned! You need upper arm strength to get on, once you are up it’s fabulous. Sun Pleasure completely stands behind their products I was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Beyler

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this product.8
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend buying this product. We had issues with the first one and it was replaced. We put up for the following year which we brought out memorial weekend and it come apart at the seams on the head and tail. There was a total of 2 people on it when it happened. It was stored in a controlled environment the whole time. I do not want another replacement. I want a refund. First pic was from the first one and the others are from the replacement that was sent.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!! Inflated so easily and really does not require us to reinflate very often. We keep it out on the lake with the anchor that came with it. Has survived storms and still looks great. Fun and comfortable as well!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angelab

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT come with speed pump!
customer_reviews.text: Mislabeled item description! Check out the listing that is cheaper without the pump and buy the pump separately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came with holes
customer_reviews.text: I receive this product and right out of the box it had 2 holes in it. We were using this as a raffle and so I tried to fix it but, it’s like finding a needle in a haystack!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and easy to blow up.
customer_reviews.text: I must say, " I love this pink flamingo. My family loves it. It was so comfortable I had fallen asleep." I must also mention that the customer service was an amazing help. I am satisfied and definitely purchasing more things in the future. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ciscoleeflh

customer_reviews.title: This party barge flamingo is epic. We absolutely had ...
customer_reviews.text: This party barge flamingo is epic. We absolutely had a blast taking this out on the river and just floating the day away!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Bohanon

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I felt the need to write one for this product. I bought this for the lake up the road from my house and it’s very comfy and does the job. I was iffy about buying it at first think it would deflate easily or in the middle of the water but I’m happy I did buy it. Took about 35 minutes to blow up but is definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: SaraVelardi

customer_reviews.title: This is beyond fun!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Durable. Definitely an eye catcher! Love the net in the middle so that is it like a little pool. My three young girls loving playing in it! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Nick He

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this float for an event, not sure what to expect of the quality. We were pleasantly surprised! It was amazing quality and durable - we were dragging along rocks and sand to get to the beach. It also came with it's own float that made it very easy to blow up. Days later it's still in amazing condition floating at the beach. Would definitely recommend this float!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Events Team

customer_reviews.title: Massive and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: i Purchased this giant float for a camping trip. We haven’t left yet but I wanted to inflate it to make sure there were no holes or damaged seams. I had it inflated for about 2 hours with no sign of deflation. My 5yo nephew kept jumping on it even though I told him not to but the bird held together. He even fit as a stowaway in the cooler. My sister is 5’10” for comparison. Best purchase I’ve made this year.
customer_reviews.author: Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Love it. We had to learn how to tie ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We had to learn how to tie good knots and bury the sandbag. We are the envy of our lake neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A. Bonnema

customer_reviews.title: Good for calm waters
customer_reviews.text: We took this to the lake and since most days had a current, the float moved around a lot even with the 25 lb anchor. at one point it drifted all the way down the lake and we had to reel it in with kayaks and paddleboards. I recommend this for pools and calm waters only.
customer_reviews.author: ticketljg33

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Needs a Party Flamingo!
customer_reviews.text: We have the best time on this raft!!! It is huge, but surprisingly manageable with a couple of people, blows up pretty quickly, deflates easily! Our whole group was shocked we were able to fit it back in the bag it came with. Hours and hours of fun on the lake for kids and adults alike. Cracks everyone up when they see it, and becomes quite a conversation starter!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Lohmann

customer_reviews.title: Made it right!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't ask for better customer service. My hubby does not look happy here, but it's because I'm about to make him carry this awesome toy to our lake. He LOVES it and has many rides on this with our family. We were sad to see a hole was in the neck but couldn't place where it was.... Zeke asked me to take a picture and we got a new one within 3 days. You can't find better customer service! Thanks Zeke and company for making it right and pleasing this lake family of 5!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Huhner

customer_reviews.title: Flamingo, yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever. This flamingo is the talk of the bay.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Family Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Family loves this huge float. We had some issues but once the Seller responded they corrected the problems at once.
customer_reviews.author: DeLane G.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Attention Garnering Lake Toy
customer_reviews.text: Our guests, adults and children, absolutely love the HUGE flamingo. It's nice for relaxing, playing, diving, visiting. Easiest to get in and out via dock ladder. We are now the conversation of the lake - those people with the giant flamingo float. Thanks for adding to our water fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun float
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase of the summer! Adults and kids loved it at the lake.
customer_reviews.author: KPerry

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The rope loop popped out after 5 mins of tugging . Literally spend 250$ for 5 mins of fun. PISSED.
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!
customer_reviews.text: This inflates easily with a leaf blower, and it unflates within an hour, too. All 6 of us floated on it all afternoon! Worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: dking

customer_reviews.title: Fun! VERY LARGE MAKE SURE YOU HAVE ADEQUATE SPACE WHILE INFLATING
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit! we had lots of people taking pictures and videos because its so unique! Definitely the life of the afternoon
customer_reviews.author: Allysha dunmire

customer_reviews.title: HOLES
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a christmas gift. Opened it to use for the first time since summer is starting. There are tons of holes. Not fixable
customer_reviews.author: JCR

customer_reviews.title: Love this bird!!! Many laughs!
customer_reviews.text: This bird is massive but so worth the laughs and fun. The pump that comes with it is great! Note that if you try to take in the ocean choose a calm day for waves. It’s too heavy to push through the big waves.
customer_reviews.author: Libby D

customer_reviews.title: No so durable
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t open this until we got to the lake and the one side of seats had a hole. We still used it because how could we tell the kids no. But very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: CarlieMatt5

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: So easy to inflate and deflate! Super surprising! Cup holders held up, its the perfect little island!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Big
customer_reviews.text: I must say that it is absolutely beautiful and big. I have used it a couple of time and my kids and family enjoy it so much. It takes only about 30mins to inflate it and its so worth it. If you use more than 1 pump you can have it ready in 10mins. I fully recommend it. If you want all eyes on you, get this giant flamingo👌
customer_reviews.author: Ninochka R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a really float for the lake house! My daughters and their friends (19-21yrs) absolutely love it. Unfortunately we had a slow air leak in our flamingo but I was SO IMPRESSED with Sun Pleasure sending us a new flamingo very quickly. 100% Satisfied and impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check the air compressor as soon as you receive it.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened up the so long awaited flamingo, we laid it out on the grass in excitement to throw it in the lake only to find out the air compressor didn’t work and ruined our weekend out in Lake Tahoe.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Luna

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it’s LARGE! We’ve had it inflated 3 times this summer and had more than 6 adults and a lot of kids, all had a great time. Very comfortable. The cooler is a plus even towed it behind the pontoon with 6 adults riding inside. One more summer weekend ahead and looking forward to next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Nice big float
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything except for the cup holders. They are not deep enough to hold a drink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This flamingo float was above and beyond my expectation! Blows up in 15 minutes & deflates just as fast! The customer service from this company was outstanding. I had an issue with my bird and they resolved it quickly with no questions asked. Highly reccomend!!! So much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun floaty!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! High quality and fun for everyone! However, after just a few short uses, one of the benches inside won’t hold air and it appears one of the handles is about to come off :( I submitted a picture of the tear and they replaced the floaty within days!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Aldinger

customer_reviews.title: Huge! Grabs attention!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this float! It’s huge! We call it Pinky! We tie it up on the river as a permanent fixture or party float. We’ve had eight adults lounge in it and still holds up well. At first I thought the price was high but the amount of enjoyment this bird has provided is priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's defective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in august 2019 and it's been in the box since then. Took it out and blew it up and it appears that there is a flaw as one of the seams opened up and it can't be patched.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Pigeon

customer_reviews.title: Felisha the Flamingo
customer_reviews.text: My family and I enjoyed this flamingo so much!! We took it to the lake for Memorial Day and we received so many complements. Definitely a hit on the water! The kids had so much fun I definitely recommend this for any family.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Fuster

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed this tropical inflatable, no issues with it, it's big enough to hold 4 adults..
customer_reviews.author: Czarina

customer_reviews.title: Check it right away
customer_reviews.text: Inflated it for the first time, did not hold air. Soaped all the seams, no joy. Of course return window had closed, so $150 in the toilet. If you buy this, inflate it as soon as you get it. Don’t wait !
customer_reviews.author: J. Emmer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for adults too!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a week long visit from dear friends and their adult children. It was the hit of the vacation!! Well worth the investment and we highly recommend Zeke...although we did rename him after we adopted him—Fernando Amingo gave hours upon hours of fun in the sun 🌞
customer_reviews.author: Terry Q

customer_reviews.title: Love my flamingo
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!! It’s a lots of fun! Very easy to inflate definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Party Bird Island Giant Flamingo Float
customer_reviews.text: Giant is not even fitting. This thing was HUGE. So much fun!!! Very sturdy. Easy to inflate and deflate. You really need a good rope to tie it down.
customer_reviews.author: martipup

customer_reviews.title: Best float ever
customer_reviews.text: Best inflatable anything I have ever purchased. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: tim fritz

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: One day of use and a hole at the seam where the mesh and plastic meet. Impossible to patch at the location of the hole. Normal usage, not abused. Not very durable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun
customer_reviews.text: The kids all loved this blow up. The adults loved the built in cooler
customer_reviews.author: John Williams

customer_reviews.title: Flamingo life!
customer_reviews.text: We boat this giant bird for our lake house. It is a hit! We had everyone at the place going wild. It’s really nice, we can keep it inflated and tethered to our boat dock. It’s got everything, built in cooler, water comes in bottom and keeps your feet wet, and it inflated fast! Make sure you inflate the body first and it takes less than 8 minutes. We had a blast! Every few days I add a tiny bit of air and it works great, kids love during the day, adults love it at night!
customer_reviews.author: Nick C.

customer_reviews.title: Pump is very unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Very good flamingo however the pump that came with it was very dodgy and after 1 min of using it started smoking and overheating. Didn't use again so went to go buy a new one
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Floating around Lake Ontario was a blast! It took about 20 minutes to fully inflate and to deflate super easy! If you are going to use the cup holders .. coke or beer cans work best so keep that in mind. Red solo cups will fall right out.. other than that we had a blast.. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Terry S

customer_reviews.title: Fun for entire family
customer_reviews.text: It was a great addition to our water activities on the lake and summer river house. Only wished it would stay inflated longer.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We were the talk of the lake. She held up for 3 days! Easy to blow up and to take down. Very comfortable and had so much fun out on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Austin

customer_reviews.title: Love the float!
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to use and the pump blew the bird up quickly!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Huge & fun, but not super high quality
customer_reviews.text: Huge bird for lots of kids and adults. One wing deflated overnight and one of the drink holders also had a slow leak from the onset.
customer_reviews.author: anna everson

product_meta.title: Sun Pleasure Party Bird Island Giant Flamingo Float - Fast Speed Pump Included - Flamingo with Pump and Carrying Bag - use in Lake, Ocean, River, Pool Floats for up to 6 People
feature_bullets: LOUNGE IN STYLE WITH THIS GIANT PARTY BIRD ISLAND FLAMINGO FLOAT- Be the envy of your peers or share an enjoyable day of relaxation with them in this impressive giant pink flamingo float! This inflatable island flamingo float has a vibrant pink color with a beautifully detailed design in white. It comes complete with wings on the side and a cute little tail at the back.

FITS UP TO 6 ADULTS COMFORTABLY- Over 10 feet long and 10 feet tall, this giant inflatable flamingo float is spacious enough for up to 6 people and is big enough to be seen from afar. The seats and backrest of this giant inflatable lake float are wide and comfortable giving you a great place to rest before or after you go for a swim. The mesh floor also fills with water so you can keep cool while you relax.

COMES COMPLETE WITH A PUMP AND CARRY MESH BAG - All you would ever need to take this giant floating island with you on your next vacation is included. Easily transport your deflated giant float in the convenient carry mesh bag. It also comes complete with a pump so you can inflate it in minutes and enjoy relaxing in it for the whole day.

BUILT-IN COOLER AND CUP HOLDER - Our giant flamingo float boat even comes with a built-in drinks cooler. Simply fill it with ice and stash your favorite beverages to keep them cool and refreshing to drink. There are also cup holders for each seat so you don’t have to hold your drink all the time while reclining on your inflatable floating island.

DESIGNED FOR DURABILITY - Our giant floating flamingo is crafted from durable materials to ensure that it won’t easily burst even when full to capacity. Designed to resemble a real flamingo, we also made sure that it is balanced and buoyant enough to float on water. This may be used in swimming pools, lakes, rivers or the beach. Please call or email us anytime with ANY issues.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars232 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
